Slide the curacao down the other side, to lie between the vodka and grenadine syrup, and serve before the layers have a chance to mix.

description: Mix all ingredients in a wine goblet and serve.

name: East Side Press
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the pieces of ginger.

name: Dusk in Eden
description: Muddle together the pomegranate and syrup in a mixing glass. Add vodka and juice and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with pomegranate seeds.

name: Duncan Macleod
description: Mix the sake and Scotch whiskey in a beer glass with sugar. Add cola to fill and mix gently.

name: Dubonnet
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Dry Manhattan
description: Stir over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Dracula’s Kiss
description: Coat the bottom of a highball glass with grenadine syrup. Add ice and vodka. Fill with cola. Garnish with cherries.

name: Dreamy Blues
description: Pour the crème de cacao into a well-chilled cocktail glass. Float the blue curacao on top.

name: Down East Delight
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Mix well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with the maraschino cherry.

name: Double Vision
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -15 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Dorflinger
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add an extra dash of orange bitters to taste.

name: Donald Sutherland
description: First fill a 650 ml glass with crushed ice until it is overflowing. Pour in Drambuie and rye whiskey. Stir gently, as to not bruise the ice. Keep stirring until a thick frost develops on the side of the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

name: Don Pedro
description: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Dolomint
description: Pour the gin, Galliano and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Rub a mint leaf around the rim of the glass. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.

name: El Diablo
description: Pour the tequila, cassis, and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer.

name: Flirtini
description: Muddle the pineapple pieces and triple sec in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add the vodka and pineapple juice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Top with Champagne and garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Flaming Homer
description: Pour all the ingredients, except the cough syrup, into a highball glass. Stir. Add cough syrup. Ignite and extinguish before drinking.

name: Fizzy Apple Cocktail
description: Combine all three ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass and serve with ice and garnish.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
description: Layer the 2 spirits in a shot glass,with the high proof liquor on top. Light the shot and allow it to burn; then extinguish it by dropping it into the beer glass. Drink immediately.

name: Fish House Punch
description: Stir together sugar and 3½ cups water in a large bowl or pot until sugar is dissolved. Add lemon juice, rum, Cognac, and peach brandy and chill. Make sure it is covered for at least 3 hours. Put half-gallon ice block in a punch bowl and pour punch over it.

name: Firefly
description: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the grenadine syrup. Stir again or allow the grenadine syrup to float up from the bottom.

name: Firecracker
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into shot glass.

name: Fireball
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into shot glass.

name: Farnell
description: Pour Jack Daniels into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level wih lemonade. Stir lightly and garnish with lime and mint.

name: Fancy Whiskey
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Fabiola
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Everybody`s Irish
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail olive.

name: Especial
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

name: English Rose
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Epiphany
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin. Add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 blackberries.

name: Envy
description: Pour the tequila into a glass of your choice. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice. Stir well. Top up with blue curacao and stir lightly again. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Ghostbuster
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gibson
description: Stir well in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with silverskin onion and serve.

name: Garbo
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

name: General Sherman
description: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass and add a couple of drops of Tabasco sauce.

name: Fuzzy Navel
description: Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes.Top up with orange juice. Stir well for 15 seconds with a bar spoon.

name: Full Moon Fever
description: Add the 3 rums and melon liqueur in a highball glass with ice. Add a little sour mix for flavour and fill the rest with apple juice.

name: Frisky Whiskey
description: In a mixing glass add the first 4 ingredients. Top with ice. Add bitters, top with a Boston shakers tin. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Frostbite
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Frog In a Blender
description: Place all the ingredients in a blender (including the lime wheels). Blend for 3-5 seconds (ingredients will not be completely blended). Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Full House
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Fresca
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -15 seconds, strain into a chilled martini glass and top up with lemonade.

name: Friar Tuck
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a V-shaped glass (a slightly over sized cocktail glass works well).

name: French Pear Martini
description: Rim a cocktail glass with superfine sugar. Shake liquors in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into the prepared cocktail glass. Top with Champagne.

name: French Kiss
description: Layer all the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: French Connection
description: Pour ingredients into a snifter glass with ice cubes. Stir gently with a bar spoon.

name: Fourth of July
description: Pour the grenadine syrup into a shot glass. Float vodka on top of the grenadine syrup. Float blue curacao on top of the vodka.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
description: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the Galliano on top of the drink.

name: Four Men in a Boat
description: Mix the five spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: Goober
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: GoldenEye
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve with a twist of lemon.

name: Gong
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Raspberry
description: Pour the ingredientsinto a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for about 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Dream
description: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail mixer with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Golden Green Apple Cocktail
description: Add all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Add ice, shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Golden Doublet
description: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into Champagne Flute and top-up with Champagne.

name: Golden Dawn
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Cadillac
description: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15  seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Godmother
description: Pour both ingredients directly into Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Godfather
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Glitter Bomb
description: Pour energy drink into a medium sized glass. Add a shot of Goldschlager and serve.

name: Gladiator
description: Pour the two liqueurs into a shot glass. Pour the soda and juice into an Old-Fashioned glass. Drop the shot glass into the other glass and drown the drink.

name: Girl Scout Cookie
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Irish cream in top of the coffee liqueur and float the peppermint schnapps on top of the Irish cream liqueur.

name: Godchild
description: Pour both ingredients directly into Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: GingerBread Martini
description: Rub the lime wedge on the rim of a frozen cocktail glass and leave the lime there for a garnish. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the glass.

name: Ginza Mary
description: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a mixing glass and pour into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Hifi
description: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
description: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Add a splash of Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sour
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Harvard Iced Tea
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with bar spoon, garnish with a lemon slice and serve in a chilled highball glass.

name: Harrogate Nights
description: Fill a highball glass with ice then add a dash of cranberry juice. Add the rest of the ingredients to the Boston glass, shake with ice and strain into the highball glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Harrington
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Happy New Year
description: Pour the brandy, port and orange juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne.

name: Hangmans Blood
description: Double measures of gin, whiskey, port, rum and brandy are poured into a pint glass. A small bottle of stout beer is added and the whole is topped up with Champagne.

name: Halloween Hpnotist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lit Glowstick.

name: Halloween Harvest Punch
description: Add the liquid ingredients into a punch ball and mix well. Top with apple slices, blueberries and melon balls. Serve in an Old -Fashioned glass.

name: Halfpipe
description: In a rocks glass combine absinthe, coffee liqueur, cream liqueur. Stir with ice for 10 -15 seconds.

name: Hairy Navel
description: Pour the peach schnapps and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes.Top up with orange juice. Stir well and serve.

name: Grog
description: Put all the ingredients into a heat proof mug and fill with boiling water. If preferred serve in a strong tumbler when the drink has cooled a little (so as not to break the glass).

name: Grinch
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Green Vesper
description: Shake the gin, vodka, absinthe and quinine powder in a mixing tin with plenty of cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and twist a large swatch of thin cut lemon peel over the top.

name: Green Lemonade
description: Muddle the kiwi and simple syrup in a mixing glass. Add ice, lemonade and limeade. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Hot Apple Pie
description: Pour the Tuaca in an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot apple cider. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Greentini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Irish Canadian
description: Pour the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Irish Buck
description: Combine Irish whiskey and lime juice over ice in a Collins glass. Top up with ginger ale and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Incredible Hulk
description: Stir together in a mixing glass with ice. Serve over ice into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Immaculate
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: In & Out Lemontini
description: Pour a splash of Limoncello into a frozen cocktail glass. Swirl the liqueur around in a glass until all surfaces are coated. Shake the vodka in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Throw away any excess Limoncello in the glass. Strain the shaken vodka into the coated cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Illusion
description: Pour the melon liqueur, vodka, white rum, triple sec, blue curacao and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Imperial Fizz
description: Pour the whisky, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with soda. Stir well.

name: Hurricane
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, then pour into chilled cocktail glass glass and serve over ice.

name: Iceberg
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Huntress Cocktail
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Hunters Cocktail
description: Pour the whiskey and cherry brandy into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
description: Place the butter, sugar and spices at the bottom of an Irish Coffee glass. Muddle ingredients. Pour in the rum and hot water and then stir.

name: Hot Peppermint Patty
description: Pour the liqueurs into Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: Hot Baked Apple Toddy
description: Place the baked apple into a warm Irish coffee glass. Add whiskey and dissolve sugar in the mix. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Hot Apple Toddy
description: Coat the bottom of a Irisih coffee glass with honey. Add the apple brandy. Fill with hot apple cider. Garnish with lemon, cloves and cinnamon stick.

name: Hot and Fruity Toddy
description: Pour the liquor, honey and lime into an Irish coffee glass. Top with hot water and add bitters. Stir. Garnish with apple wedge.

name: Horses Neck
description: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into Old Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If required, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

name: Jersey Cocktail
description: Pour the whisky and syrup into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Add the bitters and stir well.

name: Jellyfish
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and add vodka. Float the blue curacao slowly on top. Float the white sambuca on top in the same manner.Float the cream on the very top using the back of a bar spoon. Stir very delicately to get “jellyfish” effect.

name: Jellybean
description: Pour the brandy into a shot glass. Float the sambuca on top of the first layer .Float the Southern Comfort on top of the second layer.

name: Jell-O Shot
description: Pour gelatin into a bowl. Add boiling water, stirring until the gelatin has dissolved. Stir in liquor. Refrigerate until cool. Pour into shot glasses. Refrigerate until liquid sets. Serve cold.

name: Japanese Slipper
description: Start with a cocktail shaker and fill it half full with crushed ice. Add melon liqueur, triple sec, and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a single cherry in the bottom of the glass.

name: Jamican Cobbler
description: Build the ingredients in the order listed in a wine glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the raspberries.

name: Jallu Collins
description: Mix the Jalovinna, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Jamaican Coffee
description: Brew coffee a little stronger than you usually take it. Pour coffee into a mug. Add rum and stir well. Spoon whipped cream on top of coffee. Sprinkle ground coffee on top of the cream. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Jager Bomb
description: Pour energy drink into a medium sized glass. Add a shot of Jagermeister and serve.

name: Jagertee
description: Heat your tea, rum, wine, orange juice, brandy, spices, and lemons in a pot and let them come to a gentle simmer for about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add sugar to taste and serve.

name: Jack O`Lantern
description: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a lowball glass with ice. Float an orange wheel with a lime twist poked into the top.

name: Jack Rose
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin filled with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish and serve straight up.

name: Ja Mora
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin and add loads of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Jack Collins
description: Mix the Applejack, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Italian Sunset
description: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the Amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice then top up with soda water to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine syrup then garnish with orange slice.

name: Italian Coffee
description: Pour the Strega into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Kremlin Colonel
description: Mix all ingredients, except the mint leaf, in a shaker. Strain in a highball glass. Garnish with the mint leaf.

name: Koala Mojito
description: In a cocktail shaker, muddle mint leaves with the syrup. Add the lime juice and stir. Add rum and crushed ice and stir. Add a splash of soda water. Garnish with eucalyptus leaves.

name: Kool Aid
description: Pour the melon liqueur and amaretto into a shot glass. Fill with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Kiwi Martini
description: Muddle the skinned kiwi with sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and vodka. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.

name: Kiwi Crush
description: Peel and quarter the kiwi and muddle with the vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into chilled martini glass  and garnish with a kiwi slice.

name: Kissy Suzuki
description: Pour the vodka, raspberry puree, cranberry juice, and apple juice into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain equally into 2 highball glasses half-filled with ice cubes.Top up with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with strawberries.

name: Kir Petillant
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with sparkling wine.

name: Kir Peche
description: Add the peach liqueur to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with white wine.

name: Kir Breton
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with Breton cider.

name: Kir Nomand
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with Normandy cider.

name: Key Lime Pie Martini
description: Rim a chilled cocktail glass with finely crushed Graham crackers. Pour the vodka, triple sec, pineapple juice and lime cordial into a cocktail shaker with ice. Squeeze the juice from the lime into the shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Kioki Coffee
description: Brew coffee and pour into Irish coffee glass. Add brandy and coffee liqueur. Add whipped cream to the top.

name: Kir
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with wine.

name: Kentucky Screwdriver
description: Pour the Bourbon whiskey into a Collins glass with ice. Top up with orange juice.

name: Kensington Court Special
description: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Kempinsky Fizz
description: Add the first 3 ingredeints to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top up with ginger ale. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Liquid Cocaine
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Liquid Bourbon Ball
description: Pour the bourbon and liqueur over ice in a mixing glass. Stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings.

name: Link-Up
description: Add ingredients into cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds  and serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Lindsay Lohan
description: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice. Add cranberry juice and splash of coke to fill to top. Stir as necessary.

name: Lime Cola
description: Pour the lime juice into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice.Top with cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Light `N` Stormy
description: Pour the rum into a glass over ice. Pour the ginger beer over it. Squeeze in the lime wedge and drop it in.

name: Licorice Stick
description: Pour the vodka and sambuca into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a short black licorice stick.

name: Lichitini
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Drop a lychee in the glass for garnish.

name: Liberal
description: In a mixing glass add all the ingredients except lemon twist. Add ice. Stir with bar spoon and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Lemon Drop
description: Pour vodka into shot glass. Coat a lemon wedge with sugar. Drink the shot of vodka. Follow up immediately with a bite into the sugary lemon.

name: Leite de Onca
description: Mix the condensed milk and the milk until they blend together. Add cachaça and let it rest. Add cocoa liqueur when it’s ready to serve.

name: Leap Year
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Lavender Martini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lavendar sprig.

name: Lavender Lemon Drop
description: Lightly muddle the lavendar and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and other ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lavendar sprig.

name: Margarita Jelly Shot
description: Pour the lime juice, simple syrup and water into a glass container and add the gelatin. Allow this to sit for one minute. Microwave on high for thrity seconds. Stir thoroughtly, ensuring the gelatin has dissolved. Add the triple sec, tequila and food colouring. Stir thoroughly.Pour into shot glasses.Refrigerate until the liquid sets. Serve cold.

name: Maracuja Batida
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with the cachaca in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Mango Tonic
description: Build all the  ingredients in an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Mango Sour
description: Place all of the ingredients in a blender, and mix until they are smooth. Serve in an Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Mango Spice
description: Muddle jalapeno, agave syrup and mango nectar in a mixing tin.  Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice. Fine strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with jalapeno slice.

name: Mango Julius
description: Place all the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Mango  Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled margarita glass.

name: Man `O War
description: Shake all ingredients well with ice in a mixing tin  and pour on the rocks in an Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with slice of orange.

name: Mamie Taylor
description: Pour the whiskey and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Major Bailey
description: Add all the ingredients to mixing tin and fill to the top with cubed ice. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Fill a sling glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Using a bar spoon swizzle up and down until ice is suspended in the drink. Top up with some crushed ice and garnish with lemon slices and mint.

name: M&M
description: Pour the coffee liqueur in the bottom of a shot glass.Top with the amaretto.

name: Mainbrace
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice.  Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Maidens Prayer
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Magic Bus
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Madroska
description: Build the cocktail in the Collins glass over lots of ice. Add all the ingredients, stir with bar spoon and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mae West
description: Pour the brandy, egg and sugar into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with cayenne pepper.

name: Madras
description: Pour the vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass. Stir well. Top up with orange juice.

name: Midnight Smash
description: Muddle blackberries in a cocktail shaker. Add the juice of 1 Meyer lemon, Averna liqueur, and orange flavoured vodka. Shake vigorously over ice. Strain over ice in a highball glass. Add ginger beer. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Midnight Martini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Michigan Iced Tea
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Miami Iced Tea
description: Build ingredients in a Collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Michelada
description: Mix all ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer, mix and serve.

name: Mezcal Passion
description: Add the lime, agave nectar and cucumber slices to a mixing glass and then muddle. Add the rest of the ingredients and then ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of cucumber and a pinch of chilli powder.

name: Mex-tini
description: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and add crushed ice. Let stand for five seconds. Shake vigorously for five seconds. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mexican Surfer
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a coupette glass and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Mexican Mojito
description: Mint sprigs muddled with simple syrup and lime juice. Tequila added and topped with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves. Serve with a straw.

name: Mexican Martini
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled coupette glass. Garnish with pineapple leaf.

name: Metropolitan
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Merry Irishman
description: Build ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice. Garnish and stir with a candy cane.

name: Merry Christmas
description: Pour the gin and juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir. Top with soda water. Garnish with cranberries.

name: Melon Splash
description: Mix the bourbon, soda and liqueur in a mixing glass. Pour over ice in an Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Melon Patch
description: Pour the first three ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the soda water. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Melon Margarita
description: Pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with slice of lemon peel.

name: Melon Cucumber-tini
description: Muddle a few slices of cucumber over ice in a mixing glass. Pour the muddled cucumber, vodka and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice.

name: Napolean
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Naked Lady
description: Put all ingredients into a shaker. Throw in the ice. Shake  until the outside of the shaker gets very cold. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon zest.

name: My Fair Lady
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker together with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mudslide
description: Fill an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the Old- Fashioned glass.

name: Muddled Rebuttal
description: Muddle 5 raspberries with 1 teaspoon sugar. Pour into tall glass over ice. Top with vodka and lemonade. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Mountain Sipper
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass with loads of ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Mound Bar
description: Pour the coconut rum into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Stir well. Top with whipped cream.

name: Moonwalk
description: Shake well in a cocktail shaker with ice, strain into wine glass and top up with Champagne.

name: Monte Carlo
description: Stir ingredients over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Momotaro
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a martini glass.  Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

name: Moloko Plus
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled tall glass.

name: Modern English
description: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all ingredients except for garnish. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Add cinnamon stick garnish.

name: Mojito Royal
description: Muddle mint sprigs in a glass with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and top up with Champagne. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves. Serve with a straw.

name: Mochatini
description: Rim a cocktail glass with white chocolate and sugar. Pour the liqueurs and vodka into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass.

name: Misty Maple Leaf
description: Pour the Canadian Mist and maple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Add a splash of soda water.

name: Misty Pear
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Asian pear.

name: Oriental
description: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Orange Martini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Orange Oasis
description: Pour the gin, brandy and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice filled highball glass. Top off the glass with ginger ale. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Orange Tundra
description: Add the ingredients to a highball glass in the following order: vodka, cream soda, coffee liqueur, and finally orange juice. Ice may be added if required. Do not stir before serving.

name: Orange Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with half a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Orange Blossom
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well with a bar spoon and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Orange  Julius
description: Place all ingredients in a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: One Balled Dictator
description: Briefly but violently shake ingredients in a mixing tin then pour into rocks glass containing one candy cinnamon ball.

name: Old Pal
description: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Old Lay
description: Pour the tequila, triple sec and lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with grenadine syrup.

name: Old Etonian
description: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled stemmed cocktail glass.

name: October Screwdriver
description: Pour the orange juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Slowly float the Blavod on top.

name: Old Cuban
description: Muddle the rum with the mint. Add the lime and syrup. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Obituary Cocktail
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Oatmeal Cookie
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and then strain into a shot glass.

name: Nutty Martini
description: Pour the vodka and Frangelico into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Add the sugar syrup. Shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pegu
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixing tin with crushed ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, garnish with lime twist and serve.

name: Peppermint Kiss
description: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake for 15 seconds, strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with a basil leaf and one raspberry sitting in front of the leaf.

name: Pearl Harbour
description: Pour the vodka and melon liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple chunk on a skewer.

name: Pear and Elderflower Martini
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with pear slice.

name: Pear and Cardamom Sidecar
description: Crush the cardamoms and muddle with the rest of the ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake over ice and double strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Peach Pomegranate Holiday Martini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cinnamon and sugar.

name: Peach Mojito
description: Gently muddle the mint and the rum in the glass. Add the other ingredients and lots of crushed ice. Top up with soda water, churn well, garnish and serve.

name: Peach Long Island
description: Mix all ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Peach Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour the contents into a chilled margarita glass.

name: Peach Julius
description: Place all ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Peach Cosmopolitan
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Patriot Sangria
description: Pour wine in a pitcher. Toss in the fruit and add sugar and Limoncello. Carefully stir until well blended. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Passion Punch
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with rum in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into a rocks glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Passion Fruit Vodkatini
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with rum in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Passion Fruit Martini
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with the gin in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Passion Fruit Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine.Toss in the fruit wedges and add passion fruit juice and pineapple juice. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and thinly sliced kiwi fruit just before serving.

name: Passion Fruit Caipirinha
description: Build in the glass, halve and scoop out the passion fruit, add the quartered lime, and muddle with cachaca. Add all the other ingredients and churn with lots of crushed ice.

name: Pomegranate – Pineapple Fireworks
description: Pour the vodkas and juice into a Champagne glass. Top with Champagne.

name: Polished Princess
description: In the bottom of a mixing glass , muddle the cranberries and spice in the simple syrup and lemon juice. Then add remaining ingredients and dry shake. Then add ice and shake again. Strain into a chilled martini glass and add 3 floating cranberries for garnish.

name: Polar Bear Cooler
description: Add ingredients into cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with broken ice and add a spiral of lemon. Garnish with an orange wedge . Serve with straw.

name: Polar Bear in Blizzard
description: Shake all ingredients with crushed ice in a mixing tin.  Serve in a shot glass with a mint leaf garnish.

name: Poinsettia
description: Chill all the ingredients beforehand. Pour the triple sec and cranberry juice into a chilled Champagne flute. Stir well. Top with Champagne.

name: Playa Del Mar
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into coupette glass.

name: Planters Punch
description: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into highball with ice. Top up with soda water. Stir gently and add a dash of Angostura Bitters. Garnish with orange slices.

name: Pixie Stick
description: Shake gin and melon liqueur in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a Tom Collins  glass with ice. Fill up with lemon and lime soda and garnish with a cherry.

name: Pirates Treasure
description: Pour the goldschlager into a shot glass. Float the rum on top by pouring it slowly over the back of a bar spoon.

name: Pink Lady
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with cherry.

name: Pink Squirrel
description: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pink Russian
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, and then top up with milk.

name: Pink Honey Martini
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass filled with ice.

name: Pink Grapefruit Margarita
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thorughly, strain into a coupette glass and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Raspberry Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with 1 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour the contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Raspberry Martini
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in a mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Collins
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the gin in the mixing tin, add the lemon and sugar and lots of ice, shake, fine strain over ice and top up with soda water. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Cobbler
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in a mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Raspberry Caipirinha
description: Place the raspberries and lime juice into an Old-Fashioned glass and add sugar on top. Muddle well. Fill the glass with ice, then add the cachaca. Stir well. Garnish with a raspberry.

name: Raspberry Bellini
description: Muddle the raspberries, sugar and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and add cachaca. Shake vigorously. Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne.

name: Quentao
description: Caramelize the sugar with the spices and peels, then add the liquids. Boil for a few minutes then serve hot.

name: Purple Turtle
description: Pour equal amounts of the ingredients into a cocktail  shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Purple Viking
description: Pour the liqueurs, juice and sour mix into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Top with a splash of soda water.

name: Purple Hooter
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Rabo-de-Galo
description: Mix the 2 ingredients and serve staright up in large shot glass.

name: Purple Haze
description: Pour the vodka and black raspberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice.

name: Pucker Up
description: Muddle the juice of 1 lime with 2 slices of ginger, the Angostura bitters and the sugar syrup. Strain into a lowball glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Fill as required with the soda water and stir before serving.

name: Rose Kennedy Cocktail
description: Pour vodka, soda water, and splash of the cranberry in rocks glass on ice. Garnish the beverage with lemon wedge.

name: Rosemary
description: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with sprig of rosemary.

name: Rose
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Rose Royce
description: Shake ingredients well over ice in a mixing tin and pour into a Champagne flute half-filled with Champagne. Garnish with sprig of thyme.

name: Rosabel
description: Pour chilled sweet vermouth, and crème de cassis directly into a Champagne flute. Top with a splash of Prosecco.

name: Root Beer Float
description: Fill a tall glass with ice and add the liqueurs and cream. Top up with root beer. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Ron Collins
description: Mix the rum, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Rock Lobster
description: Pour all the ingredients except the dark rum into a blender with a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Top up with dark rum.

name: Rob Burns
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Roasted Toasty
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Rob Roy
description: Stir ingredients over ice in a mixing glass and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Roasted Toasted Almond
description: Build the vodka and liqueurs into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with cream. Shake by placing a mixing tin over the glass and giving it one or two good shakes.

name: Ripley
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberry.

name: Rimbauds Left Hand
description: Combine all the  ingredients in a mixing glass, dry shake first without ice. Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with drops of rose water in the center.

name: Rhett Butler
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Resolution Martini
description: Pour the all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Sake Bomb
description: The shot of sake is dropped into the beer, causing it to fizz violently. Drink should be consumed immediately.

name: Reno
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Saigon Cooler
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the gin in the mixing tin, add the other ingredeints and lots of ice, shake and fine strain over lots of ice. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Sabai Sabai
description: Pour the Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients, except soda water, into a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Top off with soda water.

name: Russian Sunrise
description: Pour the vodka and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Russian Spring Punch
description: Add the first four ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice, shake thoroughly, strain and top up with Champagne.

name: Rum Swizzle
description: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange . Serves 6.

name: Russell Collins
description: Mix the Jagermeister, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish and serve.

name: Russian Quaalude
description: Pour the hazelnut liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Irish cream liqueur on top of the first layer. Float the vodka on top of the second layer.

name: Rum Punch
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with lemonade. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Ruby Martini
description: Add all the ingredeints to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Ruby Negroni
description: Stir in a mixing glass and strain into a flute. Top with Prosecco and garnish with a raspberry.

name: Rum Cocktail
description: Add all of the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Rubus
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Ruby Manhattan
description: Stir  over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Royal Widow
description: Pour both ingredients over ice into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Shirley Temple
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 -1 5 seconds and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with ice.

name: Sherry Cobbler
description: Place the sherry, orange and syrup into a cocktail shaker filled with crushed ice. Shake well. Pour unstrained into a tall glass. Garnish with pile of fresh blueberries and serve with straw.

name: Sherron Collins
description: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water and a large splash of orange juice, garnish and serve.

name: Shamrocked
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Shamrock Smoothie
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake until frothy. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Shady Grove Cooler
description: Add the first 3 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Seasonal Breeze
description: Add all the ingredients  over lots of ice in a Collins glass, stir with bar spoon and garnish with a freshly cut apple slice.

name: Seven and Seven
description: Pour whisky into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with 7-Up soda. Stir lightly.

name: Sea Breeze
description: Pour cranberry into glass first filled with ice. Dry shake the vodka with grapefruit and layer on top of the cranberry. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Screw-Up
description: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Add a splash of lemon-lime soda on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Screaming Viking
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a celery stalk and cucumber spear.

name: Screaming Orgasm
description: Pour first vodka, then Irish cream, then coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Scotch Whiskey Skin
description: In a coffee cup add Scotch whiskey. Fill 1/2 way with water. Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Scorpion
description: Squeeze the lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Add all the other ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass with ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Scooby Snack
description: Pour rum, crème de banane, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Add whipped cream, and shake, until well mixed and sufficiently chilled. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass and serve.

name: Spiders Kiss
description: Draw a chocolate web into a martini glass. Place in freezer and chill. Shake all ingredients and strain into a glass. For a blood effect drizzle grenadine syrup down the side of the glass. Garnish with a chocolate dipped orange slice.

name: Spiced Pear Caiprini
description: Muddle the ginger in a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add cachaca, nectar and lemon juice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pinch of nutmeg and cinnamon.

name: Spicy Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lime, lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add diced mango, honey , rum and hot sauce to the mix. Chill overnight. Add citrus soda just before serving.

name: Sparkling Wine Sangria
description: Combine all four ingredients in a pitcher and then serve immediately, so that you don’t lose your bubbles in your sparkling wine.

name: Spanish Coffee
description: Brew coffee and then add brandy and coffee liqueur. Top up the coffee with whipped cream.

name: Southern Sunrise
description: Pour the Southern Comfort and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Southern Bride
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Sour Witch
description: In the bottom of a mixing glass muddle the sour cherries in the lime juice and the almond syrup. Add the absinthe with ice and shake very well. Strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Soul Trip Tipple
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a well chilled white wine glass with raspberries dropped in the bottom.

name: Something Blue
description: Build all the ingredients in a Champagne flute.

name: Soul Kiss
description: Stir all the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Soul Manhattan
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish, and serve straight up.

name: Sombrero
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into an ice filled Old- Fashioned glass.  Slowly stir the ice and liqueur for about 15 seconds and then carefully float the cream by pouring it over the back of a bar spoon and into the drink. Serve immediately.

name: Soda Shop Cola
description: Fill a highball with ice. Add cherry juice and vanilla extract. Top off with cola. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Snowshoe
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Snowball
description: Place one ice cube in the glass and add Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Snickertini
description: Drizzle a thin line of both the chocolate and caramel sauce on the inside of a rocks glass and place in a refrigerator to chill. Combine all ingredients into a shaker and shake over ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into glass and add straw.

name: Stoplight
description: Place three shot glasses on the bar. Pour one shot of vodka in each. Add a splash of cranberry to the first shot glass. A shot of orange to the next and a splash of melon liqueur to the third. Serve.

name: Stone Wall
description: In a highball glass add bourbon and ice. Add simple syrup, stir briefly. Top up with soda water and serve.

name: Tequila Slammer
description: Mix drink in a rocks glass and serve straight up.  For fun leave about a fifth of the glass empty to allow the drink to fizz, then hold a hand over the top of the glass and slam it onto a hard surface to mix it. The slamming action releases gas bubbles from the mixed drink causing it to foam vigorously. It will then quickly escape the glass if not drunk immediately.

name: Tennessee Cowboy
description: Build the drink over ice, stir with barspoon and serve in a highball glass.

name: Teachers Pet
description: Pour the Scotch whiskey and coffee liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Shake by placing a mixing tin over the glass and giving it one or two good shakes.

name: Tartini
description: Begin by gently muddliung the strawberries with the raspberry vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Tangerine Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

name: Tamagozake
description: Whisk the raw egg yolk and honey into 3/4 cup of hot sake.

name: Sweet Sunrise
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and orange juice. Slowly pour grenadine syrup over the juice , it will sink to the bottom and slowly rise to the top of the drink. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Tall Black Russian
description: Pour the ingredients into the Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and add splash of cola.

name: T`n`T
description: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with wedge of lime and ice.

name: Sweet City
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strip of orange zest.

name: Super Sleigh
description: Pour Xante over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda. Squeeze lime wedge and drop into glass.

name: Super Fruity Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sliced peaches, strawberries limeade/lemonade, sugar and brandy. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Sundowner
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Strawmerry
description: Gently muddle the strawberries with the vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake, fine strain and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Sunburst
description: Mix vodka and grapefruit juice in a rocks glass over ice and add dash of triple sec.

name: Strawberry Margarita
description: Gently muddle the strawberries with the tequila in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake, fine strain and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Strawberry Flapper
description: Briefly blend the strawberries in a blender. Add the crème de cassis and 10 ice cubes and blend until smooth. Fill two Champagne flutes halfway with the strawberry blend. Top off with Champagne.

name: Tootsie Roll
description: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Tomate
description: Mix ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass and serve.

name: Tiki Bar Margarita
description: Add all the ingredients into a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into rocks glass over lots of crushed ice and churn. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Toasted Almond
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into ice filled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Tom & Jerry
description: Beat the sugar into the egg yolk, add the rum and incorporate the egg white. Transfer into a coffee mug and fill with boiling water. Add the brandy and garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Tiger Tail
description: Layer the ingredients in order in a shots glass.

name: Tijuana Manhattan
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with maraschino cherry, and serve straight up.

name: Ti Punch
description: Squeeze the lime well into the glass and drop in the remaining lime shells . Barely cover the lime with cane sugar. Add the rum and mix it with a bar spoon.

name: Three Wise Men
description: Mix the three spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
description: Pour absinthe and vodka into a Collins glass filled with ice and stir.Top with energy drink.

name: There Will Be Rum
description: Shake the rum, grapefruit juice and grenadine syrup in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a Champagne glass. Fill up with Champagne.Garnish with strawberry slice on the rim.

name: The Rickey
description: Combine the gin, lime and shell in a highball glass. Add ice, stir and then add sparkling mineral water.

name: The Snow Honey
description: Combine all the ingredients and serve hot in a mug with grated nutmeg.

name: The Phlump
description: Pour whiskey into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with ginger ale. Stir lightly.

name: The Raven
description: Pour the vodka, rum and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Slowly pour the Chambord over the back of a barspoon so it floats on top.

name: The Monkey Gland
description: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Ward 8
description: Shake all ingredients in mixer  with ice. Strain into ice-filled Old-Fashioned glass to serve on the rocks.

name: Vodka McGovern
description: Combine the ingredients in a highball glass. Pour over the crushed ice with a squeeze of lime on top.

name: Voodoo
description: Pour the Tia Maria into a shot glass. Float the rum cream on top of the Tia Maria. Pour the 151 proof rum on top of the rum cream.

name: Vieux Carre Cocktail
description: Pour the whiskey, Cognac and vermouth into an Old-Fashioned glass half – filled with ice. Add the bitters. Add the Benedictine then stir four times with a bar spoon. Squeeze the lemon over the drink then drop it into the glass.

name: Virgin Miami Vice
description: Place the pineapple juice, coconut cream, half & half and half cup of ice in blender. Blend the mixture until smooth. Pour the mixture into a highball glass. Place the strawberry puree, lime juice, simple syrup, and the remaining half cup of ice into a blender. Blend the mixture until smooth. Slowly pour the strawberry-lime mix over the back of a barspoon on top of the coconut-pineapple mixture. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Vienna Soother
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass. Top with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

name: Virgin Mary
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into glasses with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk .

name: Victorias Secret
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Vesper Martini
description: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

name: Very Berry Sangria
description: Toss the wine, the berries, the blackberry liqueur and the sugar in a pitcher, cover and place in the refrigerator overnight. Pour in a bottle of chilled ginger ale just prior to serving. Add ice in either the pitcher or individual glasses.

name: Vertigo
description: Stir lemon juice and ginger ale over ice in a highball glass. Float Averna on top. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Vermouth Cassis
description: Pour the creme de cassis and vermouth into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir. Fill the glass with soda water and stir again.

name: Velvet Hammer
description: Pour the liqueurs into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir. Gently top with half and half.

name: Valencian Water
description: Squeeze a glass of orange juice into a pitcher. Add a bottle of semi-dry cava. Add vodka and gin. Add sugar according to taste and put in refrigerator to chill.

name: Valkyrie
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into glass over lots of ice. Garnish with lemon slice.

name: Yellow Fairy
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Bird
description: Squeeze the lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all of the remaining ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Yashmak
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.

name: Xalapa Punch
description: In a sauce pan over low heat, combine the hot black tea and rind of two oranges (grate with carrot peeler or cheese grater). Heat for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Add the honey and stir until dissolved. Pour into a punch bowl with ice. Add the amber rum, apple brandy and dry red wine. Garnish with diced oranges and lemons.

name: Yale Cocktail
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Wolf Bite
description: In a cocktail shaker add absinthe, melon liqueur, pineapple juice and ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a 50 ml shot glass. Splash lemon-lime soda on top and a drizzle of grenadine syrup.

name: Witch Hunt
description: Build in an Old- Fashioned glass 3/4 full of ice. Stir.

name: WooWoo
description: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir with bar spoon for 15 seconds and serve.

name: Witch Doctor
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Winter Cocktail
description: Pour the rum, juice, sugar and liqueurs into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add dashes of bitters on top.

name: Widows Cork
description: Fill an Old-Fashioned glass part way with ice. Add ingredients to the glass and stir gently with bar spoon.

name: White Wine Sangria
description: Pour wine into the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the orange,lemon and lime into the wine, add brandy if desired. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sugar. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: White Lady
description: Mix the ingredients in a shaker which is half full of ice. Strain and serve in a sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a strip of lemon rind.

name: White Lightning Sangria
description: Pour wine and vodka in the pitcher and add sliced grapes, tangerine and pineapple. Next add sugar and stir gently. Chill mixture for at least one hour. Add ginger ale just before serving.

name: White Christmas Dream
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a grated nutmeg on top.

name: White Christmas
description: Build the ingredients into a snifter glass and stir lightly. Sprinkle chocolate flakes over drink to garnish.

name: White Canadian
description: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float goats milk on top and stir slowly.

name: White Carnation
description: Pour the vodka, schnapps and orange juice into a mixing glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and a splash of cream. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Whispers of the Frost
description: Pour the drinks in a wine goblet filled with ice. Add sugar to taste. Stir. Garnish with blueberries and strawberries both in the drink and on the rim.

name: Seve Ballesteros “Al Rojo Vivo”
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston Shaker and fill with cubed ice. Shake well for about 10 seconds and then strain into a red wine goblet. Fill with cubed and then crushed ice and garnish lavishly with orange, red apple and mint.

name: “Blue Dog” Zombie
description: Quarter the passion fruit and scoop out 3 quarters into a mixing tin. Add gomme syrup and lime juice and muddle together with the passion fruit pulp. Add all other ingredients and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and then strain into a hurricane glass half filled with cubed ice. Top up with crushed ice and the garnish with a quarter of passion fruit.

name: Toblerone Martini
description: Chill martini glass with ice and soda water. Add all ingredients into a Boston shaker and fill with ice. Shake for about 10 seconds and strain into the martini glass. Cover the drink with chocolate powder.

name: Ultra Violet
description: Pour the gin, pomegranate liqueur and parfait amour into boston shaker, then add the elderflower cordial, lemon juice and a dash of gomme. Pick 6 leaves from a sprig of rosemary and add to other ingredients. Fill shaker with ice and shake well. Double strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Blue Grass Sour
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Quarter the orange and squeeze the juice into the shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and shake hard for 30 seconds to ensure the egg white is well mixed. Double strain the drink into a small barrel tumbler and garnish with an orange wagon wheel.

name: Watermelon Martini
description: Peel 4 chunks of watermelon and then muddle in a mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients into mixing glass. Fill the mixing glass to the top with cubed ice and then shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into martini glass. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

name: Zurracapote
description: In the medium saucepan, combine brown sugar, wine, lemon peel and cinnamon. Bring this mixture to boil, and reduce heat, and simmer for five minutes, stirring continuously. Drain fruit & carefully add to your wine mixture. Cover the saucepan with lid & simmer for fifteen minutes on the low heat. Remove from the heat and let it sit for 2 to 3 hours prior to serving and Zurracapote can also be served cold or hot, like desired.

name: Blackberry & Apple Crumble Bramble
description: Muddle the blackberries in a jug until they are a fine pulp. Add the gin, apple juice, lemon juice and vanilla syrup in a cocktail shaker along with a couple of ice cubes. Sieve the blackberries into the shaker too. Shake all the ingredients for about 15 seconds in cocktail shaker. Blend the sugar and cinnamon together on a small plate. Coat the rim of the Collins glass with lemon juice to moisten it and then roll it in the sugar so it coats the rim. Pour the cocktail into the glass, and top up with a teaspoon of creme de cassis.

name: Plum & Vanilla Fizz
description: Add all ingredients, except soda, into Boston tin. Shake ingredients hard and fast for 15 seconds without ice to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake hard for another 15-20 seconds. Add a dash of soda to a chilled Collins glass. Pour cocktail over the soda so that it “fizz’s” up through the drink. To garnish, dip a straw or stirrer in red food colouring (unflavoured) and stir a ring around the centre of the glass going out.

name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
description: Add all ingredients into Boston shaker with lots of ice and shake for about 15 seconds. Shake and fine strain into a chilled martini glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Orange Chocolate Dream
description: Mix the cocoa powder and sugar on a small plate. Dampen the rim of a martini glass and swirl in the powder mixture to rim. Add the chocolate liqueur and Baileys to a cocktail shaker filled most of the way with ice and shake for about 20 seconds. Strain the mixture into a martini glass and float the orange liqueur on top. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Chocolate-covered Cherry
description: Pre-measure your ingredients into separate shot glasses. Pour the grenadine into a rocks glass first.

name: The Nirvana
description: Fill a large glass or beer mug with crushed ice. Add all the ingredients one by one and stir until well mixed. Garnish with a raspberry and serve with a straw.

name: Zorbatini
description: Pour the vodka and ouzo into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Greek olive.

name: Zipperhead
description: Build the ingredients in a chilled Old Fashioned glass with ice.

name: Zipper
description: Pour the Grand Marnier into a shot glass. Float the tequila on top of the Grand Marnier.Top with the Irish cream liqueur.

name: Zen Latte
description: Pour the green tea liqueur into an ice coffee glass. Top with steamed milk. Stir well. Garnish with matcha powder.

name: Zanzibar
description: Pour the ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.Twist the lemon peel over the top of the drink and drop it in the glass.

name: Zambodian
description: Pour equal amounts of the ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Zambeer
description: Pour the sambuca into a highball glass with ice. Top with root beer.

name: Z-28
description: Pour the crème de menthe into a shot glass. Float the banana liqueur on top. Top with tequila.

name: Z Street Slammer
description: Pour the rum, banana liqueur, pineapple juice and grenadine syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Yule Mule
description: Build the cocktail in a glass over lots of ice. Add all the ingredients and stir. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Yorsch
description: Mix ingredients thoroughly and drink quickly.

name: Yellow Submarine
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

name: Whiskey Smash
description: In a mixing glass add mint and lemon. Muddle thoroughly to release juice and oils. Add simple syrup and whisky. Add ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Whiskey Cobbler
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir. Add cherry and lemon slice.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled Old-Fashioned glass to serve on the rocks.

name: Watermelon Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a watermelon wedge.

name: Warm Old-Fashioned
description: Place one sugar cube into the bottom of an Old-Fashioned glass and add 3 dashes of Angostura bitters directly to the sugar cube as much as possible. Add one orange slice, one cherry and a splash of soda water and muddle thoroughly. Remove the fruit remanants. Add 2 ounces of bourbon, ice and top off with warm water. Garnish with fresh orange slice and cherry.

name: Weep No More
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktails shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Wedding Cake
description: Pour the gin, amaretto, orange juice, pineapple juice and cream in a blender with ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Wedding Belle
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Watermelon Wave
description: Pour the ingredients into a pitcher. Stir well. Strain the mixture into goblets over ice. Garnish with cubes of watermelon.

name: Washington Apple
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with apple slice.

name: Va Va Voom
description: Add the first three ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain and then top up with Champagne. Garnish.

name: Union Square
description: Muddle the strawberries with the basil until fully mashed in a cocktail shaker. Add all other ingredients. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 1/2 strawberry.

name: Un-Goa
description: Pour the tequila into the shot glass, then the rum and finally the lime juice.

name: Twilight Dove
description: Pour the juices and nectar into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with lavendar soda.

name: U-Boot
description: The shot of vodka is dropped into the pint of beer then consumed quickly.

name: Tropical Cooler
description: Combine all ingredients in a blender with cup of ice. Blend well. Pour into a well-chilled margarita glass.

name: Tropical Colada
description: In a large glass, add coconut milk, lime juice, and ice. Fill the rest of the glass with the soda.

name: Trojan Horse
description: Pour the stout beer into a pint glass. Top with the cola.

name: Torpes
description: Add all ingredients to mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Toronha
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with ice. Blend well. Strain into a chilled sour glass.

name: Toro Rojo
description: Muddle the mint and sugar together in a tall glass, and then squeeze the lime in. Mix gently and then top glass with ice. Add in rum and then top glass with energy drink.

name: Tornado
description: Stir the liquors with ice. Strain into a Collins glass. Add sugar and stir again. Add ice then cola. Stir three times and serve with a straw.

name: The Modernista
description: Add ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass. Add twist of lemon.

name: The French Pearl
description: Muddle mint with the rest of the ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: The Hyp Fairy
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: The Flirt
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain.

name: The Communist
description: Add all the ingredients into a mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly, strain and garnish with a cherry.

name: The Coutesan
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail  shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Texas Prairie Fire
description: Pour tequila in a shot glass, top off with lime juice and then add a splash of Tabasco sauce.

name: The Blenheim
description: Shake ingredients together with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Adjustable Rate
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Tequila Sunset
