description: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the blackberry brandy, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: Tequila Sunrise Margarita
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with one cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass rimmed with salt. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston Shaker and fill with ice. Shake for about 15 seconds and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Strawberry  Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and add sliced strawberries. Next add sugar, strawberry lemonade and stir gently. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Stone Fence Cocktail
description: In a double rocks glass add the bourbon and bitters and fill with ice. Top with apple cider. Stir once with a spoon to incorporate the ingredients and serve.

name: Stinger
description: Pour the ingredients into an Old-Fashioned glass with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Stone Sour
description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sour glass.

name: Staten Island Ferry
description: Stir ingredients together with bar spoon and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Starry Lime
description: Add apple vodka, cranberry juice, basil and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a fresh basil leaf.

name: Star Cocktail
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: St. Paddys Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the wedges of orange, lemon and apple (leaving out seeds if possible) and add sugar, lime juice and whiskey. Chill overnight. Add club soda or ginger ale just before serving.

name: Springbok
description: Layer the Amarula gently on to the crème de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

name: Spring Fever
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass half filled with crushed ice.

name: Sneaky Pete
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the milk and rye whiskey. Stir well.

name: Smith and Wesson
description: Pour the coffee liqueur , vodka and half-and-half into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with soda water.

name: Smith and Kearns
description: Pour the coffee liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

name: Slippery Nipple
description: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass, then pour the Irish cream liqueur on top so that the two liquids do not mix.

name: Slammer Royale
description: Mix all ingredients in a rocks glass and serve straight up.

name: Skyscraper Manhattan
description: Add the first 3 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with ginger beer. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Skittle Bomb
description: The triple sec is poured into a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the energy drink.

name: Ski Lift
description: Pour the schnapps and rum into an Irish coffee glass. Fill the glass with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle coconut flakes on top of cream.

name: Silk Stocking
description: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Silver Bullet
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass. Squeeze the lemon twist over the shot then hang it on the rim as a garnish.

name: Scarlet O`Hara
description: Pour the Southern Comfort and lime juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Sazerac
description: One rocks glass is packed with ice and water to chill the glass. In a second rocks glass, muddle the sugar cube with the bitters. Add the rye to this mixture. Stir to combine. Empty the ice from the first glass. Pour the absinthe into the glass and swirl to coat the sides of the glass. Any excess absinthe is discarded. Pour the rye/sugar/bitters mixture into the coated glass. Twist a lemon peel over the glass and rub the rim of the glass with the peel. The peel can be discarded or placed in the cocktail.

name: Savoy Corpse Reviver
description: Shake all ingredients together with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Savoy Affair
description: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass, and fill with Champagne and garnish.

name: Satans Whiskers
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Saratoga Brace Up
description: Pour all the ingredients , except the soda water, into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass. Top with soda water.

name: Santa Shot
description: Pour the grenadine syrup in a shot glass. Float the green crème de menthe on top and then float the peppermint schnapps on top of this. Make sure to pour the drinks slowly for the desired effect and use a bar spoon to help with layering if necessary

name: Sangria
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sugar and brandy. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: Sake Screwdriver
description: Mix the two ingredients in a mixing tin with ice and pour into a highball glass with 3 ice cubes. Serev chilled.

name: Saketini
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive. Serve.

name: Royal Smash
description: Muddle mint leaves and lemon wedges in a mixing glass. Add Royal Combier and ice and shake hard. Strain over ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

name: Royal Manhattan
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry and served straight up.

name: Royal Bermuda
description: Mix all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Royal Duchess
description: Add the pomegranate juice to Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Royal Arrival
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve.

name: Roy Rogers
description: Pour the ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir well. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Rourou
description: Mix ingredients and serve in Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Rosy Rum Cosmo
description: Pour the rum, triple sec, lime juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the mint leaf.

name: Rosy Dawn
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Rossini
description: Add the strawberry puree to the Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne and gently stir.

name: Rosemary Mac
description: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with sprig of rosemary.

name: REDRUM
description: Coat martini glass with rose syrup. Muddle brandy cherries and add egg whites, fresh lime juice, simple syrup, and dry shake (no ice). Add ice and Mekhong and shake again. Pour into martini glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top and garnish with rose petal.

name: RedHeaded Slut
description: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice. Add cranberry juice to fill to top. Stir as necessary and serve iced cold.

name: Red Sea Sunrise
description: Pour the lemonade, orange juice and pineapple juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Red Lotus
description: Pour the vodka, lichido and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Red Corvette
description: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a cup of ice and then pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Red Cloud
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin with lots of ice.  Shake thoroughly and fine strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Red Beer
description: Pour the tomato juice into a beer mug. Fill with beer. Add salt to taste.

name: Raspberry Truffle
description: Pour the vodka, coffee liqueur and chambord into a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake well. Strain into a chilled tall wine glass. Top with a pile of fresh whipped cream.

name: Rasputin
description: Build the cocktail in Collins glass over lots of ice. Stir for 10 seconds with bar spoon and serve.

name: Raspberry Press
description: Pour the ingredients into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Pour the contents into a cocktail shaker. Pour back into the glass. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Very Berry Mule
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain into the glass over lots of ice and top up with ginger beer. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Problem Solver
description: In a cocktail mixing glass , add first three ingredients. Add ice, stir vigorously with a bar spoon  for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass which has been rinsed with Fernet Branca. Garnish with an orange twist, making sure to express the orange oil directly onto the surface of the cocktail.

name: Prince of Wales
description: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Pour into a Champagne glass and fill with Champagne.

name: Presbyterian
description: Pour Scotch whisky into a Collins glass, add 2 ice cubes, top up with ginger ale and soda water.

name: Prairie Fire
description: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Add drops of Tabasco to taste.

name: PornStar
description: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Porto Flip
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, garnish and serve.

name: Porch Crawler
description: Combine all ingredients in a water cooler with ice. Adjust beer quantity to taste. Serve in plastic cups.

name: Popper
description: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass. Cover the glass with a napkin and your hand. Slam the glass on the bar counter. Drink while its still fizzing.

name: Pontberry Martini
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin. Add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 blackberries.

name: Pomspresso Tini
description: Pour the espresso vodka and fruit juices into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a couple of dashes of Bitters.

name: Pompanski Martini
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Pomegranate Poinsettia
description: Mix the first three ingredients in a tumbler glass with ice. Slowly add the Champagne, stirring gently.

name: Pink Gin
description: Coat the sides of a chilled martini glass with Angostura bitters, add chilled gin and serve.

name: Pomegranate Gin Fizz
description: Pour the spirits, juice, syrup, and egg white into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously to ensure egg white is mixed thoroughly with the other ingredients. Strain into a chilled highball glass with ice cubes. Top off with soda water.

name: Pink Flamingo
description: Pour the vodka, triple sec and sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Top up with orange juice. Stir well.

name: Pink Elephant
description: Combine all ingredients, except cream and sugar, into shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a martini glass. In a separate shaker combine cream and sugar and shake vigorously without ice. Carefully layer the cream on top of the base. Garnish with a raspberry and mint sprig on the rim.

name: Pink Campari
description: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add all ingredients. Shake well and pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with skewered raspberries and lime twist.

name: Pineapple Punch
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Pineapple Sangria
description: Pour wine into a large pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the white wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and pineapple then add sugar. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale, rum and ice just before serving.

name: Pina Martini
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Pineapple Mojito
description: Muddle the pineapple, lime and mint in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add the other ingredients. Shake for 10 seconds and strain all ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Phil Collins
description: Mix the lemon-lime soda, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Perroquet
description: Pour pastis and mint liqueur over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water. Stir well and serve.

name: Perfect Storm
description: Combine Grand Marnier, lime juice, and bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Top with ginger beer and swirl. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Perfect Manhattan
description: Stir over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry. Serve straight up.

name: Passbour Cooler
description: Halve and scoop out passion fruit and muddle with the bourbon in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain over lots of ice and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Passion Cocktail
description: Pour the tequila, cranberry juice and lime juice, into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled stemmed glass. Splash with Grand Marnier. Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Park Avenue Cocktail
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Parisian Blond
description: Pour the rum, curacao and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a drop of vanilla extract on top for garnish.

name: Paradise
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixing tin over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Panama
description: Shake together ingredients in a  cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg if desired.

name: Pamplemousse
description: Add the red grapefruit liqueur to the bottom of a wine glass and then slowly top up with sparkling wine.

name: Pamoyo
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Nutty Irishman
description: Pour equal amounts of the 2 liqueurs into a shot glass.

name: Nuts and Berries
description: Pour the liqueurs into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir well. Top up with cream.

name: Norina
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Serve in a chilled martini glass. Add a lemon twist as garnish.

name: Northern Lights
description: Pour the Canadian whiskey and peach schnapps into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice. Stir.

name: Nixon

description: Fill 2 metal pint mugs with boiling water and allow to stand until well warm. Discard the hot water.Pour 50 ml of whisky into one of the metal pint mugs. Into the second metal mug pour 50 ml of boiling water. Add 2 teaspoons of demerara sugar. The warmth of the mug will result in the whisky giving off alcoholic fumes. Using a lighter or match, carefully ignite the whisky. Pour the flaming whisky from one mug into the other.Immediately pour the water and whisky back into the empty mug. Repreat this process 5-6 times until sugar, whisky and water are all well mixed. Garnish with a twist of lemon zest.

name: Blue Bayou
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with the pineapple.

name: Blowjob
description: Pour the amaretto into your shot glass.  Top the amaretto with the coffee liqueur, allowing the liqueurs to combine.  Top the shot with whipped cream.

name: Blood and Sand
description: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Bloody Scotsman
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Blind Russian
description: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float Irish cream liqueur on top and stir slowly.

name: Blind Pilot
description: In a mixing glass add all the ingredients. Add ice. Stir vigorously for 30 seconds.Strain into a stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Black Widow
description: Pour the cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Float the Blavod black vodka on top.

name: Black Velvet
description: Fill a tall Champagne flute halfway with chilled stout beer and float the Champagne on top of the stout. The effect is best achieved by pouring over a spoon turned upside down over the top of the glass, so that the liquid runs gently down the sides rather than splashing into the lower layer and mixing with it.

name: Black Stripe
description: Pour the dark rum and honey into an Irish coffee glass. Twist a lemon twist over the glass and drop it into the glass. Fill the glass with hot water. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Black Samurai
description: Mix ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Black Rose
description: Pour the tequila rose into a shot glass. Float the vodka on top.

name: Bijou
description: Stir ingredients in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Beverley Hills Iced Tea
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with a bar spoon, garnish with a lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Between the Sheets
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Besame
description: Muddle limes and raspberries in a highball glass. Add Agavero. Top off with passion fruit juice. Add splash of Chambord. Pour this mix into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain back into the highball glass.

name: Best Party Sangria
description: Pour wine into a large pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and pineapple then add sugar, orange juice and gin. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale, berries and ice just before serving.

name: Berry Nice
description: Add the blackberries and vodka to the mixing tin and muddle well. Add the liqueur and lemon juice and lots of ice and shake well. Fine strain into Collins glass over ice and top up with ginger beer.

name: Berry Caipirinha
description: Build in the rocks glass , muddle the quartered lime with the blackberries, raspberries and sugar syrup. Add the cachaca and lots of crushed ice and churn well.

name: Belmont Breeze
description: Shake all ingredients with ice for 10 – 15 seconds in a cocktail shaker.Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh mint sprig.

name: Berry Bliss
description: Fill a punch bowl half way with ice. Add all ingredients, stir and garnish with strawberry slices.

name: Batida
description: Mix ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Basil-ica
description: Muddle basil with the lemon juice and simple syrup at the bottom of a mixing glass. Add gin, elderflower liqueur and the bitters. Add ice and cap the mixing glass with a Boston shaker. Shake for 10 seconds then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. To garnish, roll up the basil leaf and wrap the orange twist around and place inside the glass.

name: Barnum Cocktail
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Banshee
description: Take your cocktail shaker and fill it half way with ice. Add white creme de cacao, creme de banane, and cream. Shake it up and strain it into a chilled cocktail glass. For a finishing touch, garnish with a slice of banana before serving.

name: Baby Guinness
description: Float Irish cream on top of coffee liqueur in a shot glass.

name: Bahama Mama
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into a Collins glass with cracked ice. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Apricot Sour
description: Add the jam and the bourbon to the mixing tray and stir until the jam dissolves. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well and strain over ice. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: April Rain
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with lime peel.

name: Baltic Breeze
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -1 5 seconds and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Bamboo
description: Pour the vermouth and sherry into a mixing glass filled with ice. Add the bitters. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Twist a lemon peel over the drink to release its essence. Garnish with an olive.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
description: Pour the amaretto and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.
